<s> propaganda is a concerted set of messages aimed at influencing the opinions or behavior of large numbers of people </s>
<s> instead of impartially providing information propaganda in its most basic sense presents information in order to influence its audience </s>

<s> the most effective propaganda is often completely truthful but some propaganda presents facts selectively to encourage a particular synthesis or gives loaded messages in order to produce an emotional rather than rational response to the information presented </s>
<s> the desired result is a change of the cognitive narrative of the subject in the target audience </s>
